channel-type.label: Region switch
channel-type.description: ON in case the tracker is at specific location, OFF otherwise. This channel is added to the thing at runtime is the region is configured to have a switch for region presence instead of using triggers.

channel-type.label: Region enter trigger channel
channel-type.description: Trigger channel for entering regions. Payload is the region name. It will be created dynamically at runtime if at least one region configured for tracker (centrally or tracker level configuration) requires a trigger to be fired when entering the region.

channel-type.label: Region leave trigger channel
channel-type.description: Trigger channel for leaving regions. Payload is the region name. It will be created dynamically at runtime if at least one region configured for tracker (central or tracker level configuration) requires a trigger to be fired when leaving the region.
